translit.py¶

This module contains utilities for transliterating values into a certain locale.

class src.translit.Transliterator(locale: str, corr_table: Mapping[str, str] | None = None)¶

A class for objects that transliterate values into a certain locale with the option to correct common spelling errors.

translit(name: str) → str¶

Transliterate the specified name into locale, also performing a spell correction by default, as per correct.

This method uses the transliterate library for doing the transliteration.
